image.title: goodies2022
image.description: the image contains some items from the 2022 open hardware summit goodie bag. the is a yellow bag laying on a table with the 2022 OHS logo on it, on top is a yellow mug featuring the logo and sprinkled on the table are stickers that say "OHS2022" and "<3 open source"
